name: Dual EM Stars
advancements: Trigger an electrical explosion on the target after landing a critical hit, dealing additional damage equal to **30%** of ATK to the target and nearby enemies. Cooldown: **0.2** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Increase crit rate to electrified targets by **40%**. Electrical explosions extend the duration of electrified effects by **0.5** seconds, up to a maximum of **5** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
Double the duration of Electro Field and pull targets into the center of the attack.
Triggering an electrical explosion reduces skill cooldowns by **1** second.

abilities.name: Dual Fire
abilities.description: While on the ground, tap normal attack to attack 5 times in a row.

abilities.name: Bullet Rain
abilities.description: While airborne, tap normal attack to fire continuously at the ground, dealing damage equal to **50.6%** of ATK + **3** each hit. Consumes **220** Endurance.

abilities.name: Energy Burst
abilities.description: Hold attack button to maintain constant fire, each hit dealing **23%** x ATK + **1** base damage.

abilities.name: Phantom Kick
abilities.description: While airborne, tap and hold normal attack to trigger Phantom Kick. Knock the target down and deal damage equal to **70.5%** of ATK + **4**. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **98.7%** of ATK + **5** to nearby targets and **launch** them.

abilities.name: Rising Lightning Kick
abilities.description: Tap normal attack after dodging to **knock targets into the air** and deal damage equal to **122.6%** of ATK + **6**.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger a Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within an area. Become immune to hitstun for **0.5** seconds while dodging.

abilities.name: Electro Field
abilities.description: Fire an energy field at the target location, reflecting beams within the barrier. Deal damage equal to **269.8%** of ATK + **14**, and the last hit **strongly suspends** targets. Cooldown: **45** seconds.

abilities.name: Domain of Thunder
abilities.description: When ***weapon charge is full*** or ***Phantasia*** is triggered, **remove all debuffs from the wielder**, and create a Domain of Thunder at the target location upon switching to this weapon, dealing a total of **238.3%** of ATK + **13** damage over 3 attacks to enemies **within the area** and dispelling their buffs. The domain lasts for **3.5** seconds and deals damage equal to **42.4%** of ATK + **2** to a target every **0.5** seconds.

recommendedMatrices.name: Samir
recommendedMatrices.description: With its high rate of fire, Dual EM stars can easily maintain 100% uptime on the buff.

recommendedMatrices.name: Crow
recommendedMatrices.description: At high crit rate, Crow's 2 set is the second best choice for damage.

recommendedMatrices.name: Claudia
recommendedMatrices.description: Dual EM Stars' main damage is the aerial attack, and Claudia's 2 set is more effective than Crow's until very high crit rate. Opt for 2-set Shiro if unavailable.

recommendedMatrices.name: Sobek
recommendedMatrices.description: A good substitute for SSR damage chips if you don't have them. Very useful against groups of mobs, i.e. in Bygone Phantasm.
